name: Introduction to Python Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming language, including data types, control structures, functions, and modules. Suitable for beginners, this course provides hands-on exercises and projects to reinforce learning.

name: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Become a proficient web developer by mastering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks like React and Node.js. This comprehensive bootcamp covers both frontend and backend development.

name: Data Science with Python
description: Unlock the power of data analysis and machine learning using Python. From data wrangling and visualization to building predictive models, this course equips you with essential skills for the data-driven world.

name: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Discover the core concepts of machine learning algorithms and techniques. Covering supervised and unsupervised learning, this course provides a solid foundation for those interested in AI and data science.

name: Mobile App Development with Flutter
description: Build cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter and Dart. Learn how to design beautiful user interfaces and implement functionality for iOS and Android devices using Google's powerful framework.
